name: Common Lifecycle Enumeration
description: Ecma TC54-TG3 is chartered with the standardization of the Common Lifecycle Enumeration (CLE), an open specification designed to support the aliasing of components and communicate lifecycle events such as end-of-life (EOL), end-of-support (EOS), and changes in component provenance over time.
notes: See also https://owasp.org/www-project-common-lifecycle-enumeration/ and https://ecma-tc54.github.io/ECMA-xxx-CLE/.  No logo located.

name: Common Security Advisory Framework (CSAF)
description: A language to exchange Security Advisories.
notes: URL provides direct reference to VERS.  See also https://www.csaf.io/ and https://github.com/oasis-tcs/csaf.

name: Common Vulnerability Enumeration (CVE)
description: The CVE Record Format is the JSON schema defining the structure of CVE records.
notes: Support for PURL was added for Release 5.2.0 - https://github.com/CVEProject/cve-schema/releases/tag/v5.2.0

name: OpenVEX
description: An implementation of the Vulnerability Exploitability Exchange (VEX for short) that is designed to be minimal, compliant, interoperable, and embeddable.

name: OSV Schema
notes: See also https://github.com/ossf/osv-schema/releases.  OSV has a white-lettered logo displayed on a black background, not yet able to find an OSV logo for a white background.

name: System Package Data Exchange (SPDX)
description: A data exchange standard for human-readable and machine-processable software bill-of-materials (SBOM).
